UserDefinitedCommands.island: The dodo code for {islandname} is {dodo}. There are currently {vcount} visitors on {islandname}.
UserDefinitedCommands.villagers: The following villagers may be adopted on {islandname}: {villagerlist}.

UserDefinedSubOnlyCommands.subdodo: The dodo code for {islandname} is {dodo}. There are currently {vcount} visitors on {islandname}.
UserDefinedSubOnlyCommands.sub: Hello, @{user}! Thanks for being a subscriber!
